entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is trying to reach Nearly Headless Nick in a crowded entrance hall.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost who is waiting for Harry at the bottom of the stairs. He is the ghost of Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A student who is trying to get to the front of the queue, and is bowling over first years in the process.

relationships.description: Harry sees Nearly Headless Nick across the entrance hall and yells for him to come over. He then forces his way through the crowd to reach him.
Harry sees Zacharias Smith bowling over first years in an attempt to get to the front of the queue.
